item.description:
Dr. Ron Paul is coming to New York City and spending the evening with his supporters at the world-famous Webster Hall!

Date: September 26, 2011
Time: Doors open at 8pm
Where: Webster Hall
115 E. 11th St.
NY, NY 10003

BUY TICKETS ONLINE -----> http://ronpaulwebsterhall.eventbrite.com/

Scheduled Speakers:

Ron Paul - Confirmed
Special Guest (Pras) - Confirmed
Dan Halloran - Confirmed
Murray Sabrin - Confirmed
Jack Hunter - Confirmed Peter Schiff - Confirmed

More guest to be announced

Music by world famous DJ Avery Tanner

Tickets can be purchased ahead of time online or at any NYC Liberty HQ Event for $20 (online service fee may apply).  You may also purchase tickets at the door for $25 while supplies last.

BUY TICKETS ONLINE -----> http://ronpaulwebsterhall.eventbrite.com/


Video of Dr. Paul's April visit to Webster Hall, NYC : http://youtu.be/S1TM9ionWl4

Information about the venue:  http://www.websterhall.com
our graphic will be posted soon.

For additional information about the event, tickets and/or the venue, please call  917.515.5355
item.name: Ron Paul at Webster Hall
